doc.title: Naturally, Gas Is Good
doc.plot: In the summer of 2008, as the rest of the country was plunging into a recession, the largest natural gas field in U.S. history was discovered in NW Louisiana. The Estimated value over ONE TRILLION DOLLARS. Thousands of rural landowners outside of Shreveport were becoming overnight millionaires. Land that leased for $200 an acre, skyrocketed to $25,000 acre in less than 90 days. The whole region was abuzz. And then the energy market COLLAPSED.
